item.title: Southern Nevada Higher Education Land Act of 2008

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.

item.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. (text of measure as introduced: CR S9504-9505)
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S9503-9504)

summary.text:
Southern Nevada Higher Education Land Act of 2008 - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey three parcels of Bureau of Land Management (BLM) land to: (1) the Nevada System of Higher Education for the Great Basin College and the College of Southern Nevada; and (2) the System for the University of Nevada, Las Vegas.

Specifies that the Nevada System of Higher Education may use the conveyed federal land for any purpose relating to the establishment, operation, growth, and maintenance of the System and for any uses related to such purposes, including residential and commercial development that would generally be associated with an institution of higher education.

bill.title: Southern Nevada Higher Education Land Act of 2008

item.title: Southern Nevada Higher Education Land Act of 2008
Southern Nevada Higher Education Land Act of 2008
A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to convey to the Nevada System of Higher Education certain Federal land located in Clark and Nye counties, Nevada, and for other purposes.

latestAction.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. (text of measure as introduced: CR S9504-9505)

dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.
dublinCore.dc:contributor: Congressional Research Service, Library of Congress
dublinCore.dc:description: This file contains bill summaries and statuses for federal legislation. A bill summary describes the most significant provisions of a piece of legislation and details the effects the legislative text may have on current law and federal programs. Bill summaries are authored by the Congressional Research Service (CRS) of the Library of Congress. As stated in Public Law 91-510 (2 USC 166 (d)(6)), one of the duties of CRS is "to prepare summaries and digests of bills and resolutions of a public general nature introduced in the Senate or House of Representatives". For more information, refer to the User Guide that accompanies this file.
